Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: William Jackson
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use. The instructions are good but the follow along video instructions are even better. The only complaints that i have are that the DNS system that talk you through setting up is outdated. The company no longer supports or offers the free version. It is now a yearly fee, though the cost is under $30 a year (as of december of 2012). and there is nothing describing how to long in over the web and view the cameras.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Jen S. "Jen"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Foscam 4 camera system recently to help watch over my home when I am at work.  I received the camera system in 2 days since I ordered through the Amazon Prime option.  The delivery was very fast.  Once I received the cameras I was a little confused on how to set them up.  I called the support number in the owners manual.  After a short wait Christina answered and helped me set up the ENTIRE system.  She was great!  The tech support was WAY beyond my expectation!!!  I have yet to use the system completely, but for now... I am really impressed!  Thank you Christina for helping my set up all four cameras, my computer, AND my iPad.  I truly appreciate her patience and remote help.

Reviews.Title: It's a fair deal
Reviews.Author: Igor Dunar
Reviews.Content: Only 3 out of four worked, little bit klugy to set up. Figure it's BW the colors are washed out. For the price it's fair.

Reviews.Title: foscam support
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: Calvin from Foscam tech support was very helpfull in helping me set up my 4 cameras to work roemotely on our network system.

ProductInfo.Features:
High image & video quality,Two-way audio monitoring
Remote viewing & record from anywhere anytime with Pan/Tilt control (Pan:300°& Tilt:120°)
Auto IR-LED illumination for night vision (up to 25 ft.)
Support IE browser or any other standard browsers
9dbi Antenna gives 3x signal strength
ProductInfo.Name: Foscam New Version FI8918W Pan & Tilt Wireless IP Camera + Bonus 9dbi Antennas - Infrared Night Vision, 2 Way Audio, Motion Detection Email Alert, Windows and Mac Compatiable, Black, 4 Pack kit
